email_content:
Dear Laurent,

I hope you've been doing well!

It's been a little while since our last call at the end of August ‚Äî I remember you mentioned having some travel plans then. I wanted to reconnect and see if you're still planning to move forward with your LinkedIn awareness and lead generation campaign this autumn.

We discussed how Remote Helpers could support Digital Kidz Suisse with:
üìà Building visibility and engagement on LinkedIn through consistent posting and targeted outreach
‚úçÔ∏è Creating and refining content for your key audiences ‚Äî corporate stakeholders and investors
ü§ù Managing lead generation and follow-up to turn visibility into conversations and meetings

We'd be happy to share a few SMM and lead generation candidates who could help you launch and manage the campaign efficiently.

üìÖ Would Tuesday or Wednesday at 1:00 or 2:00 PM (your time) work for a short call to review the profiles and discuss next steps?

Looking forward to hearing from you and continuing our collaboration!

Best regards,
